Games.name: Cave Grave
Games.description:
Gave Grave is a Game I Made in Unity for Brackey's Game Jam 2020, with the Theme of 'Holes'. I Ended up Not Submitting on Time as I thought the Game Jam Ended a Day Later, Which it Didn't. I Ended Up Creating a New Jam to Submit to.

Although I made Games in tools like Scratch and Hopscotch and WARIOWARE DIY!!!!!!!!! Before Making this one, I Consider this to be my 'First Game'. It's also the first and only Game I made a Devlog on. (don't watch it)

Games.name: Dentopia
Games.description: Dentopia is the Predecessor to Birdpals - A Virtual World of which the Staff included Penguin Giraffe, Gase, and Flines, who are also on Birdpals. I was a Programmer, of course, and the Game Started being thought of as 2D like Birdpals, but Eventually Became 3D like Club Penguin Island, Before Getting Cancelled as Penguin thought we Weren't Ready Yet. A Minigame for Dentopia, Sneaky Melons, Was Planned and Barely Finished, but you can Play it on this Site!

Games.name: Sneaky Melons
Games.description: Sneaky Melons is the Minigame Previously Mentioned in the Dentopia Description - a Minigame for an Cancelled Virtual World (a game in the same genre as Club Penguin and similar) that, after Cancelling, we Decided to Resume Making it and Make it a Mobile Game. This was also Cancelled.

Games.name: Brek
Games.description: Brek is a Game I Made in Javascript in Order to Learn the Language, Following this Tutorial

Games.name: Birdpals
Games.description: Birdpals is a Virtual World (same genre as Club Penguin) that I'm a Developer of, and the Successor to Dentopia.

Games.name: Flickershmush
Games.description:
Flickershmush was a Game I Made for the Third Blackthornprod Game Jam, with the Theme of 'Less is More'.
 Use your mouse to flick your Shmush to victory! Break crates and destroy enemies! Save the race from extinction and also get money...
 The less Health you have, the more Shmushes you have to take care of... 

Sorry about the ear-piercing flick sound, it's a lot better in the Desktop version.

Games.name: Lend Me Your Power
Games.description:
You are Rabbit. Beat the Game.
 Lend Me Your Power is a Puzzle Platformer made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, where you have to get close to mages to gain power and destroy the evil Rabbots!
 Everything in this game was created by me, except the Game Engine (Unity) and the Tripfive font by Pixelmush on the unity asset store.

Games.name: Phil Ippers: Double Agent
Games.description:
How To Play: 
Deflect the Bullets from the penguins back towards the cannons & place a cannon before your suspicion metre runs out, or your enemies will find out that you're a double agent.
 Story:
 You are secret agent Phil Ippers, a penguin employed as a double agent to allow penguins to infiltrate a base successfully. 

This is my first 72 hours jam, as you may be able to tell. I don't think the game is well designed and isn't too fun, and I didn't get to playtest it. You won't enjoy this.

Games.name: Pico's Factory
Games.description:
Oh no! A factory has made EVIL CLONES of Pico's friends... and enemies. 
A mix of shooting (sorta) and platforming (sorta). Includes Characters from Pico's School, Tankmen, and Henry Stickmin. Based on Pico Vs. Bear a little. 
I made this game in a month for Pico Day. It only has 3 levels, which is a shame, but it also has brought perhaps the worst sprites ever to be found in a newgrounds game.

Games.name: Mugson Clicker
Games.description: A Clicker Game I Made to Test Out Flash for my Friend's Discord Server, Called the Chill Cafe, Based on an Emote I Made for it. The Server Rebranded to a Splatoon Server and the Website no longer Exists, so there is No Reward for Completing the Game.

Games.name: Watching Someone Pee Simulator
Games.description: oh no. made in one day based off a jackbox joke.

Games.name: Chikin X Tamago
Games.description: I Game I Made for the Newgrounds July Jam 2021! I Decided to try out Godot, and When I Made This, I did NOT like the Engine (Which is no Longer the Case) and Left a Bug where the Enemies from a Past Game would be in the New Game but Invisible, and Fixed it MUCH Later.

Games.name: Flappy Circle
Games.description: This is just a game I made at school in Flash. I started it before Watching Someone Pee Simulator, but I finished it afterwards. If you care, you can Play V1 here.

Games.name: Spooky Speed
Games.description: A Game I Made for Newgrounds for Halloween Because I Felt Like it. I Used Pump and Skid from Sr. Pelo's Spooky Month Series as the Characters. I Also Tried to Add Newgrounds Medals to the Game but They Don't Work. I Still Think It's Pretty Alright!

Games.name: Experimental Penguins Open Source
Games.description: I Really Love Early 2000s Flash Games and I Also Really Like Club Penguin, so I Decided to Try and Remake it! It's Currently Still an Ongoing Process. You Can Play it here.

Games.name: Watching Someone Pee Simulator 2
Games.description: On April 1st, I Decided that I Wanted to Make a Game for April 1st. You Know, For April Fool's Day? I Decided to make a Sequel to WSPS Because That Was Kinda Funny and so I Made the ENTIRE thing in that 1 Day and Released it. Music: Advance of the Avalanch by DXLS Deadclub of Everything 2 by valbook2

Games.name: Button Factory
Games.description: I Made this for Ludum Dare 50 with the Theme of Delay the Inevitable, But I Don't Like my Voice so It's Password Protected by the Secret Word from GMod.

Games.name: Game & Watch: Toyventure
Games.description: I Wanted to Make a Game for the Playdate, so I did. It was Designed After a Toyventure Game & Watch Mockup that my Friend flines Made. I Then Ported it to Javascript so YOU can Play it in your Browser! You Can Get the Playdate Version on Itch.io.

Games.name: Die Evil Die
Games.description: For the GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Theme: Roll of the Dice) I Asked my Buddy Reman from Rat Man Games if he Wanted to Help Me with Making a Game, and he Agreed. Together we Decided to Make a Card Turn-Based Battler Based on Box Critters' Combat Card Game. I Like it! We also Asked Eribetra to Make the Music, which Turned Out Splendid!

Games.name: D.O.G. Eat Apple
Games.description: This was my Submission to the WOWIE Jam 4.0, with the Theme of 'Collaborate with AI'. I had had the Idea in my Head for a While, so I Made a Robot Dog to Fit the Theme Better and Got Round to Making it! I'm REALLY Happy with how it Turned Out, And also Very Pleased with its Rankings, Although Level 2 was too Hard for the Second Level, and Made a Couple People Quit. Oops.

Games.name: Those Gosh Darn Flies
Games.description: I Wanted to Enter Ludum Dare 52 (Theme: Harvest) and I Also was Getting to Grips with Java at the Time. The Result? A very Rushed and Unpolished Game about Harvesting that I Didn't Get to Playtest. It's also DOWNLOAD ONLY!!!!!!!     HOW TO PLAY: You can dig up to 3 holes at a time by clicking the trowel button then on the ground. Drag a strawberry to it to plant it. Click it when the new strawberries are red to pick them. At the end of a 30 second round your score is the number of strawberries/strawberry plants x round. If a fly touches a strawberry plant it will disappear, so put a strawberry plant in its path to stop it.

Games.name: Watching Someone Pee Simulator VS
Games.description: For April Fool's 2023 I Wanted to Make Another WSPS Game. I Was Finding it Hard to Come up With an Idea for a Threequel so I Decided to Make a Multiplayer Version. To Make a Multiplayer Version, I Felt Like the Game Should Have Something Else to Add to its Complexity - I Was Making the Next ESport After all. So I Came Up with the Idea to Add a Zone that Speeds up your Cursor, to Add the Risk of it being Harder to Hit the Green Area, but the Reward of Reaching it Faster than your Opponent. MUSIC: Constipated as FUUUUUUU- by MrDumbDuck and Killer V.2 by SootSpek

Games.name: Flashbang Ninja
Games.description: During my GCSEs I Wanted a Project to Occupy me, but I Didn't Want to Spend Time on Already Existing Projects Because I Didn't Have Enough Time, so I Made This Instead for a Laugh. I also Used it to Test how to use Newgrounds API in Godot 4, which You can See in Action here and See how I did it here.

Games.name: Asteroid God
Games.description:
Made in Godot 4.1 for the GMTK Game Jam 2023.

This Theme was actually really hard for me, I spent the majority of the first day working on projects that were probably more interesting than this, but weren't that fun.

This idea isn't a winner, but game jams are just a way to finally finish something. Hopefully next year I can come up with a far better idea.

Also, cos of the whole wasting the majority of the first day + other stuff, I didn't really have time for balancing, so you might find it either too easy or to hard.

Games.name: A Boy and His --TODO-- Add Creature Name Here.
Games.description:
Your 'Gamedev' 'Friend' just sent you his newest game to try! The only issue is, he's pretty indecisive and hasn't finalised the whole 'creature' part of the game. you know. the main mechanic.

So you're gonna have to step in! Change the creature on the fly to get past these half-baked 'puzzles'.

Games.name: Me HATE Pumpkins
Games.description:
ME HATE PUMPKINS is a weird walking simulator/semi-rocket jumper/collectathon about being a guy that goes around smashing pumpkins and jumping all over the place, in a strange flesh world filled with turnip men.

The game takes 20-30 minutes to complete.

Made for a personal game jam over the month of October for Halloween, along with Craity who made into the dark as his entry.

Games.name: Preventing Someone Watching You Pee via a Shotgun Simulator
Games.description: It's time to take back the bathroom.

Games.name: Birdpals (Offline Legacy Version)
Games.description:
Birdpals was supposed to be a Club Penguin-esque Virtual World developed by me with lots of cool other people shown below. It was originally planned to later have RPG features, but during the colour party event a bug appeared where whenever a certain user joined, the game would crash. This bug ended up not being solved and the game eventually ended up being cancelled as we couldn't find a fix. After a while I managed to make this singleplayer version in a bit more than a day because I hate when online stuff shuts down forever.

CREDITS:
Penguin Giraffe (leader, designer, artist)
FarawayDrip30 (programmer)
GaseGamer (programmer)
Flines (artist)
Luna/Nyaatsuki (artist)
Dan Mizu (programmer)
Dream (programmer)
Flower Boy (writer)
Nyota (designer)
Paige (designer)
Rosekki (designer)
ManicMinerBurns (programmer, music guy)
BuddyCrafted // Eastern Studios (publisher, serverhost)

Yeah, lots of people, unfortunately most people either weren't given tasks to do or the stuff they did didn't make it into the game because management was BAD and people kept getting added to the team for no real reason. oh well.

Games.name: Super Raptor Producer
Games.description: A game I made for Ludum Dare 55. A day had passed since I realised Ludum Dare had started, and so on the last day of the holidays I decided to make a simple game I could make in a day for the compo, which I achieved! I'm very happy with it, as a matter of fact.
